name: $description
desc: Returns: The human readable description of what triggers inclusion into this topic -  for example, "Beginning of a clinical encounter".

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The human readable description of what triggers inclusion into this topic -  for example, "Beginning of a clinical encounter".

name: $resourceType
desc: Returns: The list of resource types that are candidates for this topic.  For example, the Encounter resource is updated in an 'admission' topic.

name: $addresourceType
desc: The list of resource types that are candidates for this topic.  For example, the Encounter resource is updated in an 'admission' topic.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The list of resource types that are candidates for this topic.  For example, the Encounter resource is updated in an 'admission' topic.

name: $methodCriteria
desc: Returns: The REST interaction based rules that the server should use to determine when to trigger a notification for this topic.

name: $addmethodCriteria
desc: The REST interaction based rules that the server should use to determine when to trigger a notification for this topic.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The REST interaction based rules that the server should use to determine when to trigger a notification for this topic.

name: $queryCriteria
desc: Returns: The FHIR query based rules that the server should use to determine when to trigger a notification for this topic.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The FHIR query based rules that the server should use to determine when to trigger a notification for this topic.

name: $fhirPathCriteria
desc: Returns: The FHIRPath based rules that the server should use to determine when to trigger a notification for this topic.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The FHIRPath based rules that the server should use to determine when to trigger a notification for this topic.
